Chanty

22 years old
Height:

Group (2022-present):
Lapillus

Introduction

Chanty is a Filipino-Argentinian singer, actress, and model under MLD Entertainment and Sparkle. On June 20, 2022, she debuted as a member of Lapillus with the single “Hit Ya!”. Prior to this, she was an actress in the Philippines, acting in shows like "Spirits, Reawaken" and "Starla".

Currently, Chanty is in hiatus due to health reasons. She has been diagnosed with Chronic Fatigue Syndrome.
